players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Let's focus on finding the mafia quickly. Diana was taken out last night, so we need to be extra careful with our accusations."
You: "Charlie is the mafia. I am the detective and I investigated him last night. We should vote him out now to protect the town."

Bob: "Alice claims to be the detective and says she investigated Charlie. If that's true, Charlie is mafia. But if Alice is lying and is the mafia herself, she's trying to frame Charlie. We need to see if Charlie has any defense."

Charlie: "Bob raises a good point—if Alice is telling the truth, then voting me out is the right move. But if she’s lying, she’s the real threat. Alice, can you provide any proof of your investigation?"

Bob: "Alice, if you are the detective, can you tell us who you investigated besides Charlie? Or if you investigated someone else and they were clear, it might lend more credibility to your claim about Charlie."

You: "Alice here. I only investigated Charlie last night because it was the first night and I had to pick someone. I know this is risky to claim, but if I’m lying, why would I put myself on the line so openly? Charlie is the mafia, and we..."
